name: Moonraker Patrol
overview: You are in the orbit of the moon of Geevor on your Comet Starfighter and your task is to protect its precious mines by finding and destroying as many Scavenger ships as possible during your watch. Although the Scavenger shuttles are difficult to locate, the infrared screen of your Comet will easily identify them, indicating your position in relation to them. You will have to approach the enemy at high speed, decreasing it you are in range to fire to increase accuracy. You have friends to help, remember that laser cannons are inactive against them. When comets approach you will need to dodge them to continue fighting. Published in Italy as Comet Starfighter in Special PlayGames n.16 (marzo 1986).
